import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { supabase } from '../lib/supabase' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' import { Users, Calendar, Pill, Activity, TrendingUp, AlertTriangle, Stethoscope, Building } from 'lucide-react' import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts' const Dashboard = () => { const { adminProfile } = useAuth() const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalPatients: 0, totalAppointments: 0, totalDoctors: 0, totalMedications: 0, recentAppointments: 0, pendingAppointments: 0, completedAppointments: 0, cancelledAppointments: 0 }) const [vaccineStats, setVaccineStats] = useState([]) const [appointmentTrends, setAppointmentTrends] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData() }, []) const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) // Fetch basic statistics const [ patientsCount, appointmentsCount, doctorsCount, medicationsCount, appointmentsByStatus, vaccineData, appointmentTrendsData ] = await Promise.all([ supabase.from('patients').select('id', { count: 'exact' }), supabase.from('appointments').select('id', { count: 'exact' }), supabase.from('doctors').select('id', { count: 'exact' }), supabase.from('medications').select('id', { count: 'exact' }), supabase.from('appointments').select('status'), supabase.from('immunizations').select('vaccine_name'), supabase.from('appointments').select('appointment_date, status') ]) // Process appointment status counts const statusCounts = appointmentsByStatus.data?.reduce((acc, appointment) => { acc[appointment.status] = (acc[appointment.status] || 0) + 1 return acc }, {}) // Process vaccine statistics const vaccineCounts = vaccineData.data?.reduce((acc, immunization) => { acc[immunization.vaccine_name] = (acc[immunization.vaccine_name] || 0) + 1 return acc }, {}) const vaccineChartData = Object.entries(vaccineCounts || {}).map(([name, count]) => ({ name, value: count })) // Process appointment trends (last 7 days) const last7Days = Array.from({ length: 7 }, (_, i) => { const date = new Date() date.setDate(date.getDate() - i) return date.toISOString().split('T')[0] }).reverse() const trendsData = last7Days.map(date => ({ date: new Date(date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }), appointments: appointmentTrendsData.data?.filter(apt => apt.appointment_date === date ).length || 0 })) setStats({ totalPatients: patientsCount.count || 0, totalAppointments: appointmentsCount.count || 0, totalDoctors: doctorsCount.count || 0, totalMedications: medicationsCount.count || 0, recentAppointments: statusCounts?.scheduled || 0, pendingAppointments: statusCounts?.pending || 0, completedAppointments: statusCounts?.completed || 0, cancelledAppointments: statusCounts?.cancelled || 0 }) setVaccineStats(vaccineChartData) setAppointmentTrends(trendsData) } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884D8'] if (loading) { return (
) } return (

Hospital Dashboard

Welcome back, {adminProfile?.first_name || 'Admin'}

{/* Statistics Cards */}

Total Patients

{stats.totalPatients}

Total Appointments

{stats.totalAppointments}

Total Doctors

{stats.totalDoctors}

Total Medications

{stats.totalMedications}

{/* Appointment Status Cards */}

Scheduled

{stats.recentAppointments}

Pending

{stats.pendingAppointments}

Completed

{stats.completedAppointments}

Cancelled

{stats.cancelledAppointments}

{/* Charts */}
{/* Appointment Trends */}

Appointment Trends (Last 7 Days)

{/* Vaccine Distribution */}

Vaccine Distribution

`${name} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {vaccineStats.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* App Credit */}

App created by Edwin C F of Chenations LLC

) } export default Dashboard
